segments.text: I have the chills and an upset stomach .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you felt like this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds as if you have a virus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think I should do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll give you something . I want you to take it easy and come back in a couple of days .
segments.speaker: S2
